member.name: T:jQueryApi.History.StateMergeMode
member.summary: Specifies how new state is merged into the current state.

member.name: F:jQueryApi.History.StateMergeMode.Merge
member.summary: Merge new values from the specified state, and override any current state values.

member.name: F:jQueryApi.History.StateMergeMode.MergeKeepCurrent
member.summary: Merge new values from the specified state, but keep current state values

member.name: F:jQueryApi.History.StateMergeMode.ReplaceCurrentState
member.summary: Replace the current state with the specified state.

member.name: T:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory
member.summary: Provides access to jQuery history and back button management APIs.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory.GetState
member.summary: Retrieves the current state from the browser.
member.returns: An object that contains the current state.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory.GetState(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves the current state for the specified key from the browser.
member.returns: The state value for the specified key.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory.GetState(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves the current state for the specified key from the browser.
member.param: true if numeric, boolean, undefined values should be coerced from their string representation.
member.returns: The state value for the specified key.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory.PushState(System.Collections.Dictionary)
member.param: The object containing state key/value pairs to be merged.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory.PushState(System.Collections.Dictionary,jQueryApi.History.StateMergeMode)
member.param: The object containing state key/value pairs to be merged.
Specifies how the new state should be merged into the current state.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory.RemoveState
member.summary: Clears all the state from the browser.

member.name: M:jQueryApi.History.jQueryHistory.RemoveState(System.String[])
member.summary: Removes the specified key(s) from the current state in the browser.
